msbt.message: So you gave 'em the slip, eh ? It's gotta be goin' on about <50_8 x="0" y="2" a="years" b="year" c="years" /> nowRumor was you got into it with some ruffian off-islander, and you been on the lam ever since.You got guts, kiddo, but don't bring none of that roughhousing 'round here, alright? Now, go be good.

Lookie here! It's . I ain't seen you in, what <50_8 x="0" y="2" a="years" b="year" c="years" /> and <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="month" c="months" />? Whew!You know, I was beginnin' to think you were just a figment of my addled imagination! Um You ain't, right?Well, real or not, it's good to have you back. Take care, now!

Well, great. Now I'm seein' ghosts Suppose it was only a matter of time, .Hang on, now Your youthful vigor seems awfully familiar Oh! ?!Well, ain't you a sight! You were gone so long, we didn't know what to think! Gahaha! Welcome back!

You know, you remind me of a kiddo who used to go 'round here stirrin' up all sorts of trouble.I think their name went something like Ain't seen 'em in quite a spell.You really do look like 'em, though. It's borderin' on uncannyYou're , ain't you?<10_4 /> Well, how you been, you old boot? Really had me turned around!

Hey, now! ! A few of us were startin' to wonder where you'd got to! How you been?The way you just disappeared <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="month" c="months" /> ago, we figured it was all some kinda hush-hush thing.I know a thing or two about keeping a secret, let me tell you! Like this one time that Ha! Almost had me!Ah, well! Good to see you! Don't be a stranger!

! How dare you! If you think you can just jitterbug on in here after disappearing like thatWell, you can! Folks on this island're free to come and go all willy-nilly, just as they please. How you been? Good, I hope. You look healthy! Take care, alright!

! Well, now! We all thought you up and did a runner on us!You back, then? Ain't that a relief! It hasn't been quite the same 'round here without you.Anyway, I'll let you wander. I got a pretty important nap scheduled later I gotta get ready for.

! Been dodgin' your ol' pal ?The other day I was waving my arms to get your attention, but my back started hurtin', so I stopped.Then there was that other time I was callin' out to you until I went hoarse. Bit of tea fixed THAT, .Well, glad I finally caught you! Just wanted you to know I'm doin' pretty good. Take care now!

Well now, ! Been a while since we had us a chinwag! You been avoiding me?Thought maybe it was something I'd done. I know I forgot my bath nearabout when last we spokeWell, don't you worry, I'm on the straight and narrow now! I'm squeaky clean, even behind the ears!Whew! Glad I cleared that up for you. See you around!

It's you, with the shirt! What was the name again? , was it? Been a while!Sorry about that. I got a noggin full of names and faces. Those get kinda foggy after a while, .Well, glad you came by to chat. We oughta do this more often!
